item.description:
Color as a Portal to Profound Intuitive Insight
Saturday, January 12, 10:00-noon $40
With Barb Ducharme
Register on email: Barb_Ducharme@Yahoo.com


Drawing on the energy-filled colors and images of the Aura-Soma® ‘New Aeon’ Tarot deck, we will consider the richness of information available in viewing ourselves through the lens of color. We will start with basic chakra colors and expand to include the aura. Each attendee will receive a mini-consultation during the workshop. Individual color readings with beautiful cards depicting beings of light will be available following the workshop. Book your private session directly with Barb: Barb_Ducharme@yahoo.com. $30 for 20 minutes, $45 for 30 minutes.
Learn about the symbolic meanings of your color selections. Experience colors and the Aura-Soma Tarot deck as a gateway to deep insight into- Your unique innate gifts and talents- Your deep inner resources for meeting life’s challenges- Your Soul’s perspective on your life path- What’s next in your relationships, career, personal and spiritual development, and more.
Barb is a long-time student of theories and techniques of personal development and well-being, including Life Energy Alignment Process, Dowsing, Aura-Soma®, and Labyrinths.
item.name: Color as a portal to profound intuitive insight: class and private readings
